quote: And the previous administration allowed it to happen because we shouldn't have been in Iraq, but we shouldn't have gotten out the way we got out. It created a vacuum, ISIS was formed.
quotePlain: And the previous administration allowed it to happen because we shouldn’t have been in Iraq, but we shouldn’t have gotten out the way we got out. It created a vacuum, ISIS was formed.
name: Donald Trump
where: interview with Fox News' Bill O'Reilly

claims.title: Obama policies created ISIS
claims.negative: Obama policies did not create ISIS
claims.negativePlain: Obama policies did not create ISIS
